attributes.action: ban Jonathan Ross from appearing on any TV programmes and instead replace him with the head of Richard O'Brien
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Not only is he a drain on public money, he is also just about the most irritating man on TV! I think we should replace him with a real entertainer, a man whose eyebrows a hundred times funnier.
And with the millions of pounds we would save, we could produce a new series of The Crystal Maze.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
